text: <@U03C0L82F3N> also very keen on knowing whether this is fixable. My use case is a winback/reactivation email that shows custom objects (products) based on which products the customer has bought before, which is a value populated in a contact property. But as described above, as soon as I use a contact property as part of the crm_objects() query the whole thing crashes.

Hey Everyone,

I made a blog filtering page and it works, the url now shows to which blog tag to go but i want add something to url but then filtering wont work.
Is there a other way to filter or a way to work around it ?
Does anyone know how to turn a form `redirect_id` into a URL?
